message.content:
cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.HC, cs.IR, cs.ST

The paper focuses on the role of handbooks in knowledge creation and diffusion in the field of Science and Technology Studies (STS), which is an interdisciplinary field that combines social sciences and humanities with science and technology. Therefore, cs.DL (Digital Libraries), cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval) are likely categories as they deal with information management and retrieval. Additionally, cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is a possible category as the paper discusses the role of handbooks in scholarly communication and the practice of scientific disciplines. Finally, cs.ST (Software Engineering and Programming) is a possible category as the paper discusses the changing trends in STS research, often driven by technology.
